words.translation: Ha Meem

translations.1: Haa-Meeem
translations.2: <u>Ha</u>meem

words.translation: By the Book|the clear

translations.1: Wal-Kitaabil Mubeen
translations.2: Waalkitabi almubeeni

words.translation: Indeed We|have made it|a Quran|(in) Arabic|so that you may|understand

translations.1: Innaa ja'alnaahu Quraanan 'Arabiyyal la'allakum ta'qiloon
translations.2: Inn<u>a</u> jaAAaln<u>a</u>hu qur<u>a</u>nan AAarabiyyan laAAallakum taAAqiloona

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) in|(the) Mother|(of) the Book|with Us|surely exalted|full of wisdom

translations.1: Wa-innahoo feee Ummil Kitaabi Ladainaa la'aliyyun hakeem
translations.2: Wainnahu fee ommi alkitabi ladayna laAAaliyyun hakeemun

words.translation: Then should We take away|from you|the Reminder|disregarding (you)|because|you|(are) a people|transgressing

translations.1: Afa-nadribu 'ankumuz Zikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
translations.2: Afanadribu AAankumu alththikra safhan an kuntum qawman musrifeena

words.translation: And how many|We sent|of|a Prophet|among|the former (people)

translations.1: Wa-kam arsalnaa min Nabiyyin fil awwaleen
translations.2: Wakam arsalna min nabiyyin fee alawwaleena

words.translation: And not|came to them|any Prophet|any Prophet|but|they used (to)|mock at him|mock at him

translations.1: Wa-maa ya'teehim min Nabiyyin illaa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon
translations.2: Wama yateehim min nabiyyin illa kanoo bihi yastahzioona

words.translation: Then We destroyed|stronger|than them|(in) power|and has passed|(the) example|(of) the former (people)

translations.1: Fa-ahlaknaaa ashadda minhum batshanw Wa-madaa masalul awwaleen
translations.2: Faahlakna ashadda minhum batshan wamada mathalu alawwaleena

words.translation: And if|you ask them|Who|created|the heavens|and the earth|They will surely say|Has created them|the All-Mighty|the All-Knower

translations.1: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqas samaawaati wal-arda la-yaqoolunna khalaqa-hunnal 'Azeezul 'Aleem
translations.2: Walain saaltahum man khalaqa alssamawati waalarda layaqoolunna khalaqahunna alAAazeezu alAAaleemu

words.translation: The One Who|made|for you|the earth|a bed|and made|for you|therein|roads|so that you may|be guided

translations.1: Allazee ja'ala lakumul arda mahdanw Wa-ja'ala lakum feehaa subulan la'allakum tahtadoon
translations.2: Allathee jaAAala lakumu alarda mahdan wajaAAala lakum feeha subulan laAAallakum tahtadoona

words.translation: And the One Who|sends down|from|the sky|water|in (due) measure|then We revive|with it|a land|dead|thus|you will be brought forth

translations.1: Wallazee nazzala minas samaaa'i maaa'an biqadarin fa-ansharnaa bihee baldatan maitaa' kazaalika tukhrajoon
translations.2: Waallathee nazzala mina alssamai maan biqadarin faansharna bihi baldatan maytan kathalika tukhrajoona

words.translation: And the One Who|created|the pairs|all of them|and made|for you|[of]|the ships|and the cattle|what|you ride

translations.1: Wallazee khalaqal azwaaja kullahaa Wa-ja'ala lakum minal fulki wal-an'aami maa tarkaboon
translations.2: Waallathee khalaqa alazwaja kullaha wajaAAala lakum mina alfulki waalanAAami ma tarkaboona

words.translation: That you may sit firmly|on|their backs|then|remember|(the) favor|(of) your Lord|when|you sit firmly|on them|and say|Glory be (to)|the One Who|has subjected|to us|this|and not|we were|of it|capable

translations.1: Litastawoo 'alaa zuhoorihee summa tazkuroo ni'mata Rabbikum izas tawaitum 'alaihi Wa-taqooloo Subhaanal lazee sakhkhara lana haaza Wa-maa kunnaa lahoo muqrineen
translations.2: Litastawoo AAala thuhoorihi thumma tathkuroo niAAmata rabbikum itha istawaytum AAalayhi wataqooloo subhana allathee sakhkhara lana hatha wama kunna lahu muqrineena

words.translation: And indeed we|to|our Lord|will surely return

translations.1: Wa-innaaa ilaa Rabbinaa lamunqaliboon
translations.2: Wainna ila rabbina lamunqaliboona

words.translation: But they attribute|to Him|from|His slaves|a portion|Indeed|man|surely (is) clearly ungrateful|surely (is) clearly ungrateful

translations.1: Wa-ja'aloo lahoo min 'ibaadihee juz'aa; innal insaana la-kafoorun mubeen
translations.2: WajaAAaloo lahu min AAibadihi juzan inna alinsana lakafoorun mubeenun

words.translation: Or|has He taken|of what|He has created|daughters|and He has chosen (for) you|sons

translations.1: Amit takhaza mimmaa yakhluqu banaatinw Wa-asfaakum bilbaneen
translations.2: Ami ittakhatha mimma yakhluqu banatin waasfakum bialbaneena

words.translation: And when|is given good news|(to) one of them|of what|he sets up|for the Most Gracious|(as) a likeness|becomes|his face|dark|and he|(is) filled with grief

translations.1: Wa-izaa bushshira ahaduhum bimaa daraba lir-Rahmaani masalan zalla wajhuhoo muswaddanw Wa-huwa kazeem
translations.2: Waitha bushshira ahaduhum bima daraba lilrrahmani mathalan thalla wajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa katheemun

words.translation: Then (is one) who|is brought up|in|ornaments|and he|in|the dispute|(is) not|clear

translations.1: Awa-maien yunashsha'u fil hilyati Wa-huwa fil khisaami ghairu mubeen
translations.2: Awaman yunashshao fee alhilyati wahuwa fee alkhisami ghayru mubeenin

words.translation: And they made|the Angels|those who|themselves|(are) slaves|(of) the Most Gracious|females|Did they witness|their creation|Will be recorded|their testimony|and they will be questioned

translations.1: Wa-ja'alul malaaa'ikatal lazeena hum 'ibaadur Rahmaani inaasaa; 'a-shahidoo khalqahum; satuktabu shahaadatuhum Wa-yus'aloon
translations.2: WajaAAaloo almalaikata allatheena hum AAibadu alrrahmani inathan ashahidoo khalqahum satuktabu shahadatuhum wayusaloona

words.translation: And they say|If|had willed|the Most Gracious|(we would) not|have worshiped them|Not|they have|about that|any|knowledge|Nothing|they (do)|but|lie

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo law shaaa'ar Rahmaanu maa 'abadnaahum; maa lahum bizaalika min 'ilmin in hum illaa yakhrusoon
translations.2: Waqaloo law shaa alrrahmanu ma AAabadnahum ma lahum bithalika min AAilmin in hum illa yakhrusoona

words.translation: Or|have We given them|a book|before it|before it|so they|to it|(are) holding fast

translations.1: Am aatainaahum Kitaaban min qablihee fahum bihee mustamsikoon
translations.2: Am ataynahum kitaban min qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikoona

words.translation: Nay|they say|Indeed we|[we] found|our forefathers|upon|a religion|and indeed we|on|their footsteps|(are) guided

translations.1: Bal qaalooo innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muhtadoon
translations.2: Bal qaloo inna wajadna abaana AAala ommatin wainna AAala atharihim muhtadoona

words.translation: And thus|not|We sent|before you|before you|in|a town|any|warner|except|said|(the) wealthy ones of it|Indeed, we|[we] found|our forefathers|on|a religion|and indeed, we|[on]|their footsteps|(are) following

translations.1: Wa-kazaalika maaa arsalnaa min qablika fee qaryatim min nazeerin illaa qaala mutrafoohaaa innaa wajadnaaa aabaaa'anaa 'alaaa ummatinw Wa-innaa 'alaaa aasaarihim muqtadoon
translations.2: Wakathalika ma arsalna min qablika fee qaryatin min natheerin illa qala mutrafooha inna wajadna abaana AAala ommatin wainna AAala atharihim muqtadoona

words.translation: He said|Even if|I brought you|better guidance|than what|you found|on it|your forefathers|They said|Indeed we|with what|you are sent|with [it]|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Qaala awa-law ji'tukum bi-ahdaa mimmaa wajatdtum 'alaihi aabaaa'akum qaalooo innaa bimaaa ursiltum bihee kaafiroon
translations.2: Qala awalaw jitukum biahda mimma wajadtum AAalayhi abaakum qaloo inna bima orsiltum bihi kafiroona

words.translation: So We took retribution|from them|Then see|how|was|(the) end|(of) the deniers

translations.1: Fantaqamnaa minhum fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatul mukazzibeen
translations.2: Faintaqamna minhum faonthur kayfa kana AAaqibatu almukaththibeena

words.translation: And when|Ibrahim said|Ibrahim said|to his father|and his people|Indeed, I (am)|disassociated|from what|you worship

translations.1: Wa-iz qaala Ibraaheemu li-abeehi Wa-qawmiheee innanee baraaa'un mimmaa ta'budoon
translations.2: Waith qala ibraheemu liabeehi waqawmihi innanee baraon mimma taAAbudoona

words.translation: Except|the One Who|created me|and indeed He|will guide me

translations.1: Illal lazee fataranee fa-innahoo sa-yahdeen
translations.2: Illa allathee fataranee fainnahu sayahdeeni

words.translation: And he made it|a word|lasting|among|his descendents|so that they may|return

translations.1: Wa-ja'alahaa kalimatan baaqiyatan fee 'aqibihee la-'allahum yarji'oon
translations.2: WajaAAalaha kalimatan baqiyatan fee AAaqibihi laAAallahum yarjiAAoona

words.translation: Nay|I gave enjoyment|(to) these|and their forefathers|until|came to them|the truth|and a Messenger|clear

translations.1: Bal matta'tu haaa'ulaaa'i Wa-aabaaa'ahum hattaa jaaa'a-humul haqqu Wa-Rasoolun mubeen
translations.2: Bal mattaAAtu haolai waabaahum hatta jaahumu alhaqqu warasoolun mubeenun

words.translation: And when|came to them|the truth|they said|This|(is) magic|and indeed we|of it|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-lammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu qaaloo haazaa sihrunw Wa-innaa bihee kaafiroon
translations.2: Walamma jaahumu alhaqqu qaloo hatha sihrun wainna bihi kafiroona

words.translation: And they say|Why not|was sent down|this|the Quran|to|a man|from|the two towns|great

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo law-laa nuzzila haazal Quraanu 'alaa rajulin minal qaryataini 'azeem
translations.2: Waqaloo lawla nuzzila hatha alquranu AAala rajulin mina alqaryatayni AAatheemun

words.translation: Do they|distribute|(the) Mercy|(of) your Lord|We|[We] distribute|among them|their livelihood|in|the life|(of) the world|and We raise|some of them|above|others|(in) degrees|so that may take|some of them|others|(for) service|But (the) Mercy|(of) your Lord|(is) better|than what|they accumulate

translations.1: A-hum yaqsimoona rahmata Rabbik; Nahnu qasamnaa bainahum ma'eeshatahum fil hayaatid dunyaa Wa-rafa'naa ba'dahum fawqa ba'din darajaatin li-yattakhiza ba'duhum ba'dan sukhriyyaa; Wa-rahmatu Rabbika khairun mimmaa yajma'oon
translations.2: Ahum yaqsimoona rahmata rabbika nahnu qasamna baynahum maAAeeshatahum fee alhayati alddunya warafaAAna baAAdahum fawqa baAAdin darajatin liyattakhitha baAAduhum baAAdan sukhriyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimma yajmaAAoona

words.translation: And if not|that|(would) become|[the] mankind|a community|one|We (would have) made|for (one) who|disbelieves|in the Most Gracious|for their houses|roofs|of|silver|and stairways|upon which|they mount

translations.1: Wa-law-laaa aien yakoonan naasu ummatanw waahidatan laja'alnaa limaien yakfuru bir-Rahmaani li-buyootihim suqufan min fiddatinw Wa-ma'aarija 'alaihaa yazharoon
translations.2: Walawla an yakoona alnnasu ommatan wahidatan lajaAAalna liman yakfuru bialrrahmani libuyootihim suqufan min fiddatin wamaAAarija AAalayha yathharoona

words.translation: And for their houses|doors|and couches|upon which|they recline

translations.1: Wa-li-buyootihim abwaabanw Wa-sururan 'alaihaa yattaki'oon
translations.2: Walibuyootihim abwaban wasururan AAalayha yattakioona

words.translation: And ornaments of gold|And not (is)|all|that|but|an enjoyment|(of) the life|(of) the world|And the Hereafter|with|your Lord|(is) for the righteous

translations.1: Wa-zukhrufaa; Wa-in kullu zaalika lammaa mataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa; wal-aakhiratu 'inda Rabbika lilmuttaqeen
translations.2: Wazukhrufan wain kullu thalika lamma mataAAu alhayati alddunya waalakhiratu AAinda rabbika lilmuttaqeena

words.translation: And whoever|turns away|from|(the) remembrance|(of) the Most Gracious|We appoint|for him|a devil|then he|(is) to him|a companion

translations.1: Wa-maien ya'shu 'an zikrir Rahmaani nuqaiyid lahoo Shaitaanan fahuwa lahoo qareen
translations.2: Waman yaAAshu AAan thikri alrrahmani nuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qareenun

words.translation: And indeed they|surely turn them away|from|the Path|and they think|that they|(are) guided

translations.1: Wa-innahum la-yasuddoo-nahum 'anis sabeeli Wa-yahsaboona annahum muhtadoon
translations.2: Wainnahum layasuddoonahum AAani alssabeeli wayahsaboona annahum muhtadoona

words.translation: Until|when|he comes to Us|he says|O would that|between me|and between you|(were the) distance|(of) the East and the West|How wretched is|the companion!

translations.1: Hattaaa izaa jaaa'anaa qaala yaa-laita bainee Wa-bainaka bu'dal mashriqaini fabi'sal qareen
translations.2: Hatta itha jaana qala ya layta baynee wabaynaka buAAda almashriqayni fabisa alqareenu

words.translation: And will never|benefit you|the Day|when|you have wronged|that you|(will be) in|the punishment|sharing

translations.1: Wa-lai yanfa'akumul Yawma iz zalamtum annakum fil 'azaabi mushtarikoon
translations.2: Walan yanfaAAakumu alyawma ith thalamtum annakum fee alAAathabi mushtarikoona

words.translation: Then can you|cause to hear|the deaf|or|guide|the blind|and (one) who|is|in|an error|clear

translations.1: Afa-anta tusmi'us summa aw tahdil 'umya Wa-man kaana fee dalaalin mubeen
translations.2: Afaanta tusmiAAu alssumma aw tahdee alAAumya waman kana fee dalalin mubeenin

words.translation: And whether|We take you away|We take you away|then indeed, We|from them|(will) take retribution

translations.1: Fa-immaa nazhabanna bika fa-innaa minhum muntaqimoon
translations.2: Faimma nathhabanna bika fainna minhum muntaqimoona

words.translation: Or|We show you|that which|We have promised them|then indeed We|over them|have full power

translations.1: Aw nuriyannakal lazee wa'adnaahum fa-innaa 'alaihim muqtadiroon
translations.2: Aw nuriyannaka allathee waAAadnahum fainna AAalayhim muqtadiroona

words.translation: So hold fast|to that which|is revealed|to you|Indeed you|(are) on|a Path|Straight

translations.1: Fastamsik billazeee oohiya ilaika innaka 'alaa Siraatin Mustaqeem
translations.2: Faistamsik biallathee oohiya ilayka innaka AAala siratin mustaqeemin

words.translation: And indeed it|(is) surely a Reminder|for you|and your people|and soon|you will be questioned

translations.1: Wa-innahoo la-zikrun laka Wa-liqawmika Wa-sawfa tus'aloon
translations.2: Wainnahu lathikrun laka waliqawmika wasawfa tusaloona

words.translation: And ask|(those) whom|We sent|before you|before you|of|Our Messengers|did We make|besides|besides|the Most Gracious|gods|to be worshipped

translations.1: Was'al man arsalnaa min qablika mir Rusulinaaa 'a-ja'alnaa min doonir Rahmaani aalihatany yu'badoon
translations.2: Waisal man arsalna min qablika min rusulina ajaAAalna min dooni alrrahmani alihatan yuAAbadoona

words.translation: And certainly|We sent|Musa|with Our Signs|to|Firaun|and his chiefs|and he said|Indeed I am|a Messenger|(of the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Wa-laqad arsalnaa Moosaa bi-aayaatinaaa ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ihee faqaala innee Rasoolu Rabbil 'aalameen
translations.2: Walaqad arsalna moosa biayatina ila firAAawna wamalaihi faqala innee rasoolu rabbi alAAalameena

words.translation: But when|he came to them|with Our Signs|behold!|They|at them|laughed

translations.1: Falamma jaaa'ahum bi-aayaatinaaa izaa hum minhaa yadhakoon
translations.2: Falamma jaahum biayatina itha hum minha yadhakoona

words.translation: And not|We showed them|of|a Sign|but|it|(was) greater|than|its sister|and We seized them|with the punishment|so that they may|return

translations.1: Wa-maa nureehim min aayatin illaa hiya akbaru min ukhtihaa Wa-akhaznaahum bil'azaabi la'allahum yarji'oon
translations.2: Wama nureehim min ayatin illa hiya akbaru min okhtiha waakhathnahum bialAAathabi laAAallahum yarjiAAoona

words.translation: And they said|O|[the] magician!|Invoke|for us|your Lord|by what|He has made covenant|with you|Indeed we|(will) surely be guided

translations.1: Wa-qaaloo yaaa ayyuhas saahirud'u lanaa Rabbaka bimaa 'ahida 'indaka innanaa lamuhtadoon
translations.2: Waqaloo ya ayyuha alsahiru odAAu lana rabbaka bima AAahida AAindaka innana lamuhtadoona

words.translation: But when|We removed|from them|the punishment|behold!|They|broke (their word)

translations.1: Falammaa kashafnaa 'anhumul 'azaaba izaa hum yankusoon
translations.2: Falamma kashafna AAanhumu alAAathaba itha hum yankuthoona

words.translation: And called out|Firaun|among|his people|he said|O my people|Is not|for me|(the) kingdom|(of) Egypt|and these|[the] rivers|flowing|underneath me|underneath me|Then do not|you see

translations.1: Wa-naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa-qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra Wa-haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon
translations.2: Wanada firAAawnu fee qawmihi qala ya qawmi alaysa lee mulku misra wahathihi alanharu tajree min tahtee afala tubsiroona

words.translation: Or|am I|better|than|this|one who|he|(is) insignificant|and hardly|and hardly|clear

translations.1: Am ana khairun min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw Wa-laa yakaadu yubeen
translations.2: Am ana khayrun min hatha allathee huwa maheenun wala yakadu yubeenu

words.translation: Then why not|are placed|on him|bracelets|of|gold|or|come|with him|the Angels|accompanying (him)

translations.1: Falaw-laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratun min zahabin aw jaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen
translations.2: Falawla olqiya AAalayhi aswiratun min thahabin aw jaa maAAahu almalaikatu muqtarineena

words.translation: So he bluffed|his people|and they obeyed him|Indeed they|were|a people|defiantly disobedient

translations.1: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa-ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
translations.2: Faistakhaffa qawmahu faataAAoohu innahum kanoo qawman fasiqeena

words.translation: So when|they angered Us|We took retribution|from them|and We drowned them|all

translations.1: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa-aghraqnaahum ajma'een
translations.2: Falamma asafoona intaqamna minhum faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeena

words.translation: And We made them|a precedent|and an example|for the later (generations)

translations.1: Faja'alnaahum salafanw Wa-masalan lil-aakhireen
translations.2: FajaAAalnahum salafan wamathalan lilakhireena

words.translation: And when|is presented|(the) son|(of) Maryam|(as) an example|behold!|Your people|about it|laughed aloud

translations.1: Wa-lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmuka minhu yasiddoon
translations.2: Walamma duriba ibnu maryama mathalan itha qawmuka minhu yasiddoona

words.translation: And they said|Are our gods|better|or|he|Not|they present it|to you|except|(for) argument|Nay|they|(are) a people|argumentative

translations.1: Wa-qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; bal hum qawmun khasimoon
translations.2: Waqaloo aalihatuna khayrun am huwa ma daraboohu laka illa jadalan bal hum qawmun khasimoona

words.translation: Not|he|(was) except|a slave|We bestowed Our favor|on him|and We made him|an example|for (the) Children of Israel|for (the) Children of Israel

translations.1: In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi Wa-ja'alnaahu masalan li-Baneee Israaa'eel
translations.2: In huwa illa AAabdun anAAamna AAalayhi wajaAAalnahu mathalan libanee israeela

words.translation: And if|We willed|surely We (could have) made|among you|Angels|in|the earth|succeeding

translations.1: Wa-law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon
translations.2: Walaw nashao lajaAAalna minkum malaikatan fee alardi yakhlufoona

words.translation: And indeed it|surely (is) a knowledge|of the Hour|So (do) not|(be) doubtful|about it|and follow Me|This|(is the) Path|Straight

translations.1: Wa-innahoo la-'ilmun lis-Saa'ati fa-laa tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatun Mustaqeem
translations.2: Wainnahu laAAilmun lilssaAAati fala tamtarunna biha waittabiAAooni hatha siratun mustaqeemun

words.translation: And (let) not|avert you|the Shaitaan|Indeed he|(is) for you|an enemy|clear

translations.1: Wa-laa yasuddan-nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwun mubeen
translations.2: Wala yasuddannakumu alshshaytanu innahu lakum AAaduwwun mubeenun

words.translation: And when|came|Isa|with clear proofs|he said|Verily|I have come to you|with wisdom|and that I make clear|to you|some|(of) that which|you differ|in it|So fear|Allah|and obey me

translations.1: Wa-lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil-Hikmati Wa-li-ubaiyyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha Wa-atee'oon
translations.2: Walamma jaa AAeesa bialbayyinati qala qad jitukum bialhikmati waliobayyina lakum baAAda allathee takhtalifoona feehi faittaqoo Allaha waateeAAooni

words.translation: Indeed|Allah|He|(is) my Lord|and your Lord|so worship Him|This|(is) a Path|Straight

translations.1: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem
translations.2: Inna Allaha huwa rabbee warabbukum faoAAbudoohu hatha siratun mustaqeemun

words.translation: But differed|the factions|from|among them|so woe|to those who|wronged|from|(the) punishment|(of the) Day|painful

translations.1: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fa-wailun lil-lazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi Yawmin aleem
translations.2: Faikhtalafa alahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lillatheena thalamoo min AAathabi yawmin aleemin

words.translation: Are|they waiting|except|(for) the Hour|that|it should come on them|suddenly|while they|(do) not|perceive

translations.1: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an ta'tiyahum baghtatanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon
translations.2: Hal yanthuroona illa alssaAAata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum la yashAAuroona

words.translation: Friends|that Day|some of them|to others|(will be) enemies|except|the righteous

translations.1: Al-akhillaaa'u Yawma'izin ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen
translations.2: Alakhillao yawmaithin baAAduhum libaAAdin AAaduwwun illa almuttaqeena

words.translation: O My slaves!|No|fear|on you|this Day|and not|you|will grieve

translations.1: Yaa-'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma Wa-laaa antum tahzanoon
translations.2: Ya AAibadi la khawfun AAalaykumu alyawma wala antum tahzanoona

words.translation: Those who|believed|in Our Verses|and were|submissive

translations.1: Allazeena aamanoo bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-kaanoo muslimeen
translations.2: Allatheena amanoo biayatina wakanoo muslimeena

words.translation: Enter|Paradise|you|and your spouses|delighted

translations.1: Udkhulul Jannata antum Wa-azwaajukum tuhbaroon
translations.2: Odkhuloo aljannata antum waazwajukum tuhbaroona

words.translation: Will be circulated|for them|plates|of|gold|and cups|And therein|(is) what|desires|the souls|and delights|the eyes|and you|therein|will abide forever

translations.1: Yutaafu 'alaihim bi-sihafin min zahabinw Wa-akwaab, Wa-feehaa maa tashtaheehil anfusu Wa-talazzul a'yunu Wa-antum feehaa khaalidoon
translations.2: Yutafu AAalayhim bisihafin min thahabin waakwabin wafeeha ma tashtaheehi alanfusu watalaththu alaAAyunu waantum feeha khalidoona

words.translation: And this|(is) the Paradise|which|you are made to inherit|for what|you used (to)|do

translations.1: Wa-tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
translations.2: Watilka aljannatu allatee oorithtumooha bima kuntum taAAmaloona

words.translation: For you|therein|(are) fruits|abundant|from it|you will eat

translations.1: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratun minhaa ta'kuloon
translations.2: Lakum feeha fakihatun katheeratun minha takuloona

words.translation: Indeed|the criminals|(will be) in|(the) punishment|(of) Hell|abiding forever

translations.1: Innal mujrimeena fee 'azaabi jahannama khaalidoon
translations.2: Inna almujrimeena fee AAathabi jahannama khalidoona

words.translation: Not|will it subside|for them|and they|in it|(will) despair

translations.1: Laa yufattaru 'anhum Wa-hum feehi mublisoon
translations.2: La yufattaru AAanhum wahum feehi mublisoona

words.translation: And not|We wronged them|but|they were|themselves|wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-maa zalamnaahum Wa-laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen
translations.2: Wama thalamnahum walakin kanoo humu alththalimeena

words.translation: And they will call|O Malik!|Let put an end|to us|your Lord|He (will) say|Indeed you|(will) remain

translations.1: Wa-naadaw yaa-Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakithoon
translations.2: Wanadaw ya maliku liyaqdi AAalayna rabbuka qala innakum makithoona

words.translation: Certainly|We have brought you|the truth|but|most of you|to the truth|(are) averse

translations.1: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi Wa-laakinna aksarakum lil-haqqi kaarihoon
translations.2: Laqad jinakum bialhaqqi walakinna aktharakum lilhaqqi karihoona

words.translation: Or|have they determined|an affair|Then indeed We|(are) determined

translations.1: Am abramooo amran fainnaa mubrimoon
translations.2: Am abramoo amran fainna mubrimoona

words.translation: Or|(do) they think|that We|(can) not|hear|their secret(s)|and their private counsel(s)|Nay|and Our Messengers|with them|are recording

translations.1: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum Wa-najwaahum; balaa Wa-Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon
translations.2: Am yahsaboona anna la nasmaAAu sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusuluna ladayhim yaktuboona

words.translation: Say|If|had|the Most Gracious|a son|Then I|(would be the) first|(of) the worshippers

translations.1: Qul in kaana lir-Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen
translations.2: Qul in kana lilrrahmani waladun faana awwalu alAAabideena

words.translation: Glory be|(to the) Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|(the) Lord|(of) the Throne|above what|they ascribe

translations.1: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal-ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
translations.2: Subhana rabbi alssamawati waalardi rabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoona

words.translation: So leave them|(to) converse vainly|and play|until|they meet|their Day|which|they are promised

translations.1: Fazarhum yakhoodoo Wa-yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon
translations.2: Fatharhum yakhoodoo wayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allathee yooAAadoona

words.translation: And He|(is) the One Who|(is) in|the heaven|God|and in|the earth|God|And He|(is) the All-Wise|the All-Knower

translations.1: Wa-Huwal lazee fis samaaa'i ilaahunw Wa-fil ardi ilaah; Wa-Huwal Hakeemul 'Aleem
translations.2: Wahuwa allathee fee alssamai ilahun wafee alardi ilahun wahuwa alhakeemu alAAaleemu

words.translation: And blessed is|the One Who|to Whom|(belongs the) dominion|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between both of them|and with Him|(is the) knowledge|(of) the Hour|and to Him|you will be returned

translations.1: Wa-tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa Wa-'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
translations.2: Watabaraka allathee lahu mulku alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma waAAindahu AAilmu alssaAAati wailayhi turjaAAoona

words.translation: And not|have power|those whom|they invoke|besides Him|besides Him|(for) the intercession|except|who|testifies|to the truth|and they|know

translations.1: Wa-laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi Wa-hum ya'lamoon
translations.2: Wala yamliku allatheena yadAAoona min doonihi alshshafaAAata illa man shahida bialhaqqi wahum yaAAlamoona

words.translation: And if|you ask them|who|created them|they will certainly say|Allah|Then how|are they deluded

translations.1: Wa-la'in sa-altahum man khalaqahum la-yaqoolun nallaahu fa-annaa yu'fakoon
translations.2: Walain saaltahum man khalaqahum layaqoolunna Allahu faanna yufakoona

words.translation: And his saying|O my Lord!|Indeed|these|(are) a people|(who do) not|believe

translations.1: Wa-qeelihee yaa-Rabbi inna haaa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon
translations.2: Waqeelihi yarabbi inna haolai qawmun la yuminoona

words.translation: So turn away|from them|and say|Peace|But soon|they will know

translations.1: Fasfah 'anhum Wa-qul salaam; fasawfa ya'lamoon
translations.2: Faisfah AAanhum waqul salamun fasawfa yaAAlamoona
